amendment.description: Amendment provides that women and minority groups, as appropriate, are included for membership on the Wildlife and Hunting Heritage Conservation Council Advisory Committee.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 113-339 to ensure that women and minority groups, as appropriate, are included for membership on the Wildlife and Hunting Heritage Conservation Council Advisory Committee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castro (TX) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
